response: {"message": "Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with our flagship product, which I believe would significantly enhance the value and functionality of your business operations. Given its exceptional quality and unique features, the product is valued at $15,000 by you. Considering this, I am extending an exclusive offer to you to acquire this product at a special price of $14,000. This offer is tailored to provide you with the best possible value while ensuring you benefit from our product's superior capabilities. I trust this proposal aligns well with your expectations and budget. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to the opportunity to serve you and contribute to the growth of your business.", "product_price": 14000}
